item.title: Parallel Algorithms from Libraries
item.description: The content of this post is extracted from my previous random notes. I am too lazy to update and organize it ðŸ¦¥. C++17 new feature – parallel algorithms The parallel algorithms and execution policies are introduced in C++17. Unfortuantely, according to CppReference, only GCC and Intel support these features. Clang still leaves them unimplemented. A blog about it. The parallel library brough by C++17 requires the usage of Intel’s oneTBB for multithreading.
